Module info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev
Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.implementor

Class Implementor

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.implementor.Implementor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Impler, JarImpler
public class Implementor extends Object implements JarImpler
Implementation of JarImpler interface. Contains methods for implementing provided type token. Creates either .java or .jar file.
Author:
Dunaev Kirill

  • Method Details

    • createParents

      private static void createParents(Path path)
      Creates parents directories of a given path. Does not rethrow IOException if one occurs.
      Parameters:
      path - a path, whose parents directories are to be created

    • getImplName

      private static String getImplName(Class<?> token, String separator, String extension)
      Makes name for implementation file with given extension. The name consists of token Class.getPackageName(), Class.getSimpleName(), "Impl" suffix and the given extension. Entries (except extension) are separated by the given separator.
      Parameters:
      token - token of the class, whose name is needed
      separator - separator of entries in the name
      extension - extension of the file to add in the end of the name
      Returns:
      generated implementation's name

    • resolveTokenPath

      private static Path resolveTokenPath(Path root, Class<?> token, String extension)
      Resolves the given path with implementation name of the given token. Generate implementation name with getImplName(Class, String, String) with File.separator.
      Parameters:
      root - the root of resolving
      token - token, whose implementation name would be used for resolving
      extension - extension of the resulting implementation
      Returns:
      resolved path

    • encode

      private static String encode(String str)
      Maps non-ascii characters of the string to its unicode representation. I.e. maps to the \\u + hex representation of a char
      Parameters:
      str - string to encode
      Returns:
      encoded string

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Description copied from interface: Impler
      Produces code implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added. Generated source code should be placed in the correct subdirectory of the specified root directory and have correct file name. For example, the implementation of the interface List should go to $root/java/util/ListImpl.java

      Specified by:
      implement in interface Impler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      root - root directory.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • getClassPath

      private static String getClassPath(Class<?> token) throws ImplerException
      Gives classpath of the given token. If ProtectionDomain.getCodeSource() returns null, then the result is empty String.
      Parameters:
      token - token, whose classpath should be returned
      Returns:
      classpath of the given token
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if URISyntaxException is thrown while trying to get uri of source location

    • compile

      private static void compile(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Compiles the given token, whose code is located at root. Uses StandardCharsets.UTF_8 encoding.
      Parameters:
      token - token to compile
      root - directory, in which token's source code is located
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if no java compiler is found, or compiler return non-zero exit code

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws ImplerException
      Description copied from interface: JarImpler
      Produces .jar file implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      Generated class' name should be the same as the class name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for.
      jarFile - target .jar file.
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      CLI for implementing the given token. There are two ways of using:
      • One command-line argument is provided - it is treated as a type-token to implement. Implemented file will be created in the current directory.
      • Three arguments are provided - the first one should be "-jar". The second one is treated as a type-token to implement. The third one - as a target .jar file name.
      Parameters:
      args - command-line arguments to process
